item.title: Essential Reading
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: Below you will find an ongoing list of materials that I have found interesting or helpful along the way. Books DR. David R. Hawkins Letting Go “Letting Go: The Pathway of Surrender” is a book I recently finished and I am still in the process of integrating it, and will likely re-read it. Transcending the Levels of Consciousnes “Letting Go: The Pathway of Surrender” is a book I recently finished and I am still in the process of integrating it, and will likely re-read it.
